description.value:
Activateâ€”Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1, or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target, using the hypopen's item level in place of your spellcasting ability modifier and your Medicine proficiency bonus in place of your spellcasting proficiency bonus, or end persistent poison or bleed damage, or or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl] for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
